name: properties_get_broadband
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zoopla_v2.
Tool description: This API helps to query for properties for rent, sale in UK to create a real estate site/application such as zoopla.com
API description: Fetch broadband information for a given property listing.

listing_id.description: The ID of the property listing for which broadband information is to be retrieved. This value is typically obtained from the `/properties/list` endpoint.
